desc: Seamless swimwear, separates and intimates. Bikinis and one pieces that are inclusive of all body types and skin tones. Versatile pieces that can be worn as outerwear, lingerie or swimwear. Sexy and figure flattering designs for all ages.

layout.text: SLOW FASHION. MADE IN CAPE TOWN

The TATUM collection exudes femininity through timeless pieces, with an emphasis on multi-functionality, comfort and inclusivity of all body types and skin tones. TATUM BABES are those that share a conscious consumer mindset and are passionate about wearing and supporting slow fashion.
